content: Someone asked for a stream we could use for core notifications. I've set that up. I suggest that we continue to discuss core issues here in General channel, but use that channel for automated Github notifications. Is that what others were thinking as well?

Sounds good to me. While we can use a Topic in the General stream instead (and people can mute the topic if they don't like it) I don't think that'd be good for all new people to see and have to do manually. Better to have an opt-in stream than an opt-out topic.
@StPaulTim I made the Core Notifications stream so that only admins can post to it (that'll negate the need to tell people not to post there in the stream description) :smile:
@BWPanda (Peter) - Good call. I didn't do that, because I wasn't sure who is going to try and set up notifications and if they will need access to it.
But, if someone needs greater access, we can fix that.
